name: Mumps
description: «Mumps» — This is a game about a pig called a Mumps, which should collect all the acorns for itself for the winter. Feel like a pig and survive collecting acorns. Help the pig to pass all levels.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP (SP 2,3), Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128mb Storage: 128 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP (SP 2,3), Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128 mb Storage: 130 MB available space
